bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with ya guan jin ji 牙關緊急 , tightly closed jaws. Shi zhai bai yi xuan Recipe book. Southern Song era, 1196. fang 是齋百一選方 3: 如牙 關緊，即撬開灌入 , “If the jaws are tight , force them open to instill (the medication)”.
606 Ya guan jin bi 牙關緊閉 , tightly closed jaws [6]

Illness Sign identical with ya guan jin ji 牙關緊急, tightly closed jaws. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry cong 葱 quotes Rui zhu tang jing yan fang 瑞竹堂經驗方 : 卒心急痛，牙關緊閉，欲絕 , “Suddenly the heart is tense and painful. The jaws are tightly closed . [The patient] is on the verge of dying”.
